text: At today's hackathon, we created an agent-based pipeline for transcribing speech, summarizing the transcribed speech, and generating a voice output of said summary
Our first team used Python and a few libraries to transcribe speech
Our second team leveraged a model loaded into Ollama to summarize the transcribed speech
Our last team used a library from Huggingface called Parler TTS to generate speech from a summarized JSON input file
To build projects like these, join us at the next bi-weekly Hackathon at the Tech Incubator at Queens College!
